pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyMacaroons===========PyMacaroons is a Python implementation of Macaroons. *They're better than cookies!*Installation------------Install PyMacaroons by running: pip install pymacaroonsContribute----------- `Issue Tracker`_- `Source Code`_.. _Issue Tracker: https://github.com/ecordell/pymacaroons/issues.. _Source Code: https://github.com/ecordell/pymacaroonsLicense-------The project is licensed under the MIT license.
